alfredsnippet.snippet:
start_time="00:02:00"
end_time="00:39:10"
video="{clipboard}"
video_name="${video%.mp4}"
output_clip="${video_name}_clip.mp4"

ffmpeg -i "$video" -t $(($(echo "$start_time" | awk -F: '{print $1*3600+$2*60+$3}') - 0)) -c copy "${video_name}_temp_part1.mp4"

ffmpeg -i "$video" -ss $(($(echo "$end_time" | awk -F: '{print $1*3600+$2*60+$3}') + 1)) -c copy "${video_name}_temp_part2.mp4"

echo "file '${video_name}_temp_part1.mp4'" > mylist.txt
echo "file '${video_name}_temp_part2.mp4'" >> mylist.txt

ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i mylist.txt -c copy "$output_clip"

rm "${video_name}_temp_part1.mp4"
rm "${video_name}_temp_part2.mp4"
rm mylist.txt

echo "Cleanup complete. The final video is saved as '$output_clip'."
alfredsnippet.name: Video Cut- Remove clip
